alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 2:54AM CST until February 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Less than one inch of additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will result in areas of blowing snow and visibilities below a half mile at times, especially in open country. * WHERE...West Becker, West Otter Tail and East Otter Tail Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility at times, especially in open country. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail
